articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: AI hacktivists target Disney in massive data leak - The Verge
articles.description: The 1TB data trove supposedly obtained from Disney’s internal Slack channels includes login credentials, code, images, and information about unreleased projects.
articles.content:
Disneys internal Slack was leaked by hackers mad about AI
Disneys internal Slack was leaked by hackers mad about AI
 / The hackers claiming responsibility say they advocate for artist rights.
